question:
Dataset W: –9, –3, 3, 9
Dataset X: 2, 4, 6, 8
Dataset Y: 100, 101, 102, 103
Dataset Z: 7, 7, 7, 7
Which of the following choices lists the four datasets above in order from least standard deviation to greatest standard deviation?
(A) W, X, Y, Z
(B) W, Y, X, Z
(C) W, X, Z, Y
(D) Z, Y, X, W
(E) Z, X, Y, W
